1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Convert relation to text table.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert.RelTable
7  ( relTable,
8    relTableLines,
9    relText,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Data.List                    as List
13import qualified Data.Map                     as Map
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture     as O
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base         as B
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax       as S
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data         as D
18
19
20
21-- --------------------------------------------  Rel table
22
23relTable :: (D.CRel c, B.MixShortEncode c) => [S.ShortDef] -> D.Rel c -> String
24relTable sh = unlines . relTableLines sh
25
26relTableLines :: (D.CRel c, B.MixShortEncode c) => [S.ShortDef] -> D.Rel c -> [String]
27relTableLines sh r = render $ relCells 2 size [] text where
28    text = relText sh r
29    size = maxTermSize text
30
31relCells :: Int -> TermSize -> S.TermPath -> D.RelText -> [[B.Cell]]
32relCells pad m path (D.Rel he bo) = table where
33    table = let ns = D.getTermNames he
34                h  = map (text . S.showTermName) ns
35            in h : map rule h : map (tuple ns) bo
36    tuple ns cs = map content $ zip ns cs
37    content (n, c) = case c of
38                       D.MonoNest r -> texts $ render $ relCells pad m path' r
39                       D.MonoTerm s -> width $ text s
40        where path' = n : path
41              width cell = let w = Map.findWithDefault 0 path' m
42                           in cell { B.cellWidth = pad + w }
43
44    texts  = B.textBlockCellPlus 1 B.Front
45    text   = B.textCell B.Front
46    rule _ = B.textRuleCell '-'
47
48relText :: (D.CRel c, B.MixShortEncode c) => [S.ShortDef] -> D.Rel c -> D.RelText
49relText sh (D.Rel he bo) = D.Rel he $ map (map content) bo where
50    content c | D.isRel c  = D.MonoNest $ relText sh $ D.gRel c
51              | otherwise  = D.MonoTerm $ B.mixToFlatString $ B.mixShortEncode (S.shortText sh) c
52
53render :: [[B.Cell]] -> [String]
54render = B.squeezeEmptyLines . B.renderTable " " . B.alignTable
55
56
57
58-- --------------------------------------------  Term Map
59
60type TermMap a = Map.Map S.TermPath a
61type TermSize = TermMap Int
62
63maxTermSize :: D.RelText -> TermSize
64maxTermSize = termMap D.gMonoNest (O.stringWidth . D.gMonoTerm) max
65
66termMap :: forall a. forall c.
67    (c -> D.Rel c) -> (c -> a) -> (a -> a -> a) -> D.Rel c -> TermMap a
68termMap gRel from f (D.Rel he bo) = accum [] ts bo Map.empty where
69
70    ts = D.typeTerms $ D.headType he
71
72    accum :: S.TermPath -> [D.NamedType] -> [[c]] -> O.Map (TermMap a)
73    accum path ts1 bo1 m = foldr (column path) m $ zip ts1 (List.transpose bo1)
74
75    column :: S.TermPath -> (D.NamedType, [c]) -> O.Map (TermMap a)
76    column path ((n, D.TypeRel ts2), cs2) m = accum (n : path) ts2 (bodies cs2) m
77    column path ((n, _)            , cs2) m = foldr (add $ n : path) m cs2
78
79    add :: S.TermPath -> c -> O.Map (TermMap a)
80    add path c m = Map.insertWith f path (from c) m
81
82    bodies :: [c] -> [[c]]
83    bodies = concatMap (D.relBody . gRel)
84
